wikipedia_page.main: Jack Braughton (22 February 1921 – 30 October 2016) was a British long-distance runner who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born in Grimsby.

response: *Jack Braughton (1921–2016), long-distance runner who represented Britain in the Olympics
